title: Inspection at various stages: The Commissioner may at any time during erection of a building or the execution of any work or development, make an inspection thereof without giving previous notice of his intention so to do so
clause_text: Inspection at various stages: The Commissioner may at any time during erection of a building or the execution of any work or development, make an inspection thereof without giving previous notice of his intention so to do so.
